text: He will easily be content and at peace, whose conscience is pure.

text: Oh, how great peace and quietness would he possess who should cut off all vain anxiety and place all his confidence in God.
author: Thomas a Kempis

text: Civil strife is as much a greater evil than a concerted war effort as war itself is worse than peace.
